message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $90 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $105?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can do $115, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $110?
I'm not willing to go any lower than my previous offer of $115. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
